>
> One question that I want to ask: what do you guys consider the
> smal=
lest viewing screen you need to see to play gladiator?

When I was playing =
single player, and had the radar, that tended to be
how much room I needed.=

> wou=
ld need to see about 10 tiles above you, 10 tiles below you, 10

your left, and 10 tiles to your right.  The reason I ask this
